text: Kare wa ryōshin o kōza ni nobora seta. Suruto ichidō wa kare ni hirefushita. Suruto kare wa itta. `Watashi no chichiyo, korega ōnen no watashi no yume no kaishakudesu. Waga omo wa, sore o shinjitsu ni nasaimashita. Hontōni kare wa, watashi ni onchō o atae, rōgoku kara watashi o o-dashi ni nari, mata akuma ga, watashi to kyōdai to no ma ni bimyōna tekii o kakitateta nochi, sabaku kara anata gata o tsurete ko rareta nodearimasu. Waga omo wa, o nozomi no mono ni wa nasakebukaku ara remasu. Hontōni kare wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara remasu
